name: TDD
description: Test-driven deevlopment: first create a failing test, then create enough code to make it pass. Finally refactor the design. Repeat until feature is complete.

name: Pair Programming
description: Two developers work together at one workstation: a driver that writes code (tactical) and a navigator that reviews the code and and thinks about improvements, design and future issues to adress (strategic).

name: Code Reviews
description: Read and comment peer's code to find mistakes, learn from each other and improve the general code quality and design.

name: RFC
description: Written "Request For Comments" documents as a decision-making tool for teams.

name: Coding Dojo
description: Meeting where a bunch of coders get together to work on a programming challenge. They are there to have fun and to engage in DeliberatePractice in order to improve their skills.
